tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_roles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    role VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
CREATE TABLE role (id INT, role_name TEXT)
CREATE TABLE user (id INT, username TEXT, role_id INT)
CREATE TABLE sensitive_data (id INT, data TEXT)

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
    user_id INT,
    role_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 username TEXT,
 password TEXT,
 role TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE roles (
 role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 role_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_roles (
 user_id INT,
 role_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE sensitive_info (
 info_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 info TEXT,
 level TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_sensitive_info_view (
 user_id INT,
 info_id INT
)
